'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

##  Background

Upon re-entering your body, you awake in the Captain's cabin of [The Defiant](/theDefiant/).

## Points of interest

* This area is part of the prologue, after your soul enters your body you awake to a stunned [Edér](/eder/). After some reuniting banter, one member of the crew rushes in, and exclaims that the ship is under attack by pirates.
* You can get some starting gear from the armoire, next to the bust of [The Steward](/theSteward/). It is required that you do this before exiting. The gear contained within is entirely dependent on your starting class and the weapon proficiencies chosen.
* Exiting the cabin leads to the fight with [Benweth](/benweth/), and the scripted interaction involving the ship being beached onto [Vilario's Rest](/vilariosRest/).

## Characters

* [Edér](/eder/), title character from {{poe1}}, waiting by your bedside.
* [The Steward of Caed Nua](/theStewardOfCaedNua/), the bust on the pedestal against the wall.
* Your animal companion, waiting at the bedside if you're a [Ranger](/ranger/).

## Loot

* In the armoire:
** Two base weapons (or shields) depending on your chosen weapon proficiencies.
*** If the "Fine Equipment" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessings/) is enabled, these will be replaced with the Fine version of the same weapons.
** [Mail Armor](/mailArmorDeadfire/).
*** If the "Fine Equipment" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessings/) is enabled, this is replaced with [Fine Robe](/fineRobeDeadfire/), [Fine Leather Armor](/fineLeatherArmorDeadfire/), [Fine Breastplate](/fineBreastplateDeadfire/), [Fine Brigandine](/fineBrigandineDeadfire/)
** 20x [Golden Duc](/currencyGoldenDuc/)
** 15x [Copper Pand](/currencyCopperPand/)
** [Hylea's Bounty](/hyleasBounty/), only if you kept your promise to [Hylea](/hylea/) during [Council of Stars](/councilOfStars/) in {{poe1}}.
** [Berath's Black Bell](/berathsBlackBell/), only if you kept your promise to [Berath](/berath/) during [Council of Stars](/councilOfStars/) in {{poe1}}.
** [Mythical Adra Stone](/mythicalAdraStone/), if the "Mythical Discovery" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessings/) is enabled.
** [Weathered Grimoire](/weatheredGrimoireDeadfire/) (or [Adventurer's Grimoire](/adventurersGrimoire/) during the [Backer Beta](/backerBeta/)), only as [Wizard](/wizard/).
** 8x [Whiteleaf](/whiteleafDeadfire/), only as [Monk](/monk/) ([Nalpazca](/nalpazca/)).

##  Trivia 

* This is the only time the Captain's Cabin is accessible as a separate area. During the game, it is contained within the [Belowdecks](/belowdecks/) area of ''[The Defiant](/theDefiant/)'', and is viewed from a different angle. Some of the furniture has been shifted around to compensate for this.
* Captain's Cabin is contained within the same area as [The In-Between](/theInBetween/) (as seen from the map screen), albeit with the rest of the area hidden. If you re-load the game while in this area, part of [The In-Between](/theInBetween/) will become visible.
